Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Hepta Labs joined Filecoin as an SP starting in 2021. In order to comply with Filecoin's plan to store the most important data of humanity, we transformed our business. We have gone through the preparatory phase and contacted nearly 20 SPs. Most expressed willingness to collaborate on our important data storage plan.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
The dataset content includes: automatic driving, openmmlab, classical benchmark, intelligent remote sensing, intelligent medical, virtual reality, multimodal, openxdlab, intelligent education The raw data and training dataset will be backed up in 10 copies.
Dataset types include: text, image, video, audio, etc.
These data will be used in subsequent media campaigns and need to be backed up.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: I will be preparing the data via the hard drives that are now in our server room, one way of sending the drives by mail. Alternatively we can use the louts tool to process the data for transfer.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server, IPFS
